title: "Yes, Sir!"
brightcove_name: 100 Greatest Moments In Sports - No. 17 - "Yes, Sir!"
brightcove_short_desc: Starting the final round tied for ninth place, Nicklaus’s final major victory was one of his most improbable. He shot a 30 on the back nine and a 65 for the round, winning his 18th and final major championship.
brightcove_long_desc: Starting the final round tied for ninth place, Nicklaus’s final major victory was one of his most improbable. He shot a 30 on the back nine and a 65 for the round, winning his 18th and final major championship.
headline: "Yes, Sir!"
page_title: Jack Nicklaus wins 1986 Masters tournament at age 46
body: Starting the final round tied for ninth place, Nicklaus’s final major victory was one of his most improbable. He shot a 30 on the back nine and a 65 for the round, winning his 18th and final major championship.
